 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּשַׂר‎</span> **noun masculine** ==flesh== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּסַר‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּשָׂר‎</span>, √ <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בשׂר‎</span>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ב‎</span> [[Dan.7.5|Dan 7:5]] ***flesh*** (as devoured by beast); emphatic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּשְׂרָא‎</span> [[Dan.2.11|Dan 2:11]] ***flesh*** = mankind, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כָּלבֿ‎</span> [[Dan.4.9|Dan 4:9]] = all creatures.
